divs: Sighting DetailsThree witnesses observed and videotaped a large brightly lit object in an unknown location as they drove home to Wyoming from Las Vegas in March of 1998. Investigator observed the video, but the witness refuses to release it for analysis.
trends: There have been 229 other sightings in Las Vegas
There was one other sighting in Las Vegas on or around February 28th 1998
Summary: Strange light videotaped North of Las Vegas as witnesses drive home.
